name: Islands
detail: Discover the Bay of Islands by helicopter, with an optional landing at the Hole in the Rock. See Cape Brett from above during an aerial tour.

name: Netherlands
detail: Here are 15 of the best places to see in the Netherlands, from charming cheese markets to beautiful parks to ever seductive Amsterdam.

name: Florence
detail: Florence is the kind of city that beckons tourists from all corners of the world. Everyone wants to see the Duomo and gaze at the statue of David.

name: The Bahamas
detail: Plan your sightseeing and find out more about the best places to visit in these idyllic islands with our list of the top attractions in the Bahamas.

name: Singapore
detail: Singapore River. If the main reason why you are visiting the city is its nightlife scene, Riverside is most probably the best area for you.

name: Ankaran
detail: Top Ankaran Nature & Wildlife Areas: See reviews and photos of Nature & Wildlife Areas in Ankaran, Slovenia on Tripadvisor.

name: Brooklyn Bridge
detail: This pier offers the best views of the Manhattan skyline and East River in Brooklyn Bridge Park DUMBO.You can stroll right along the river.

name: Lucerne
detail: As with many European cities, Old Town Lucerne, or Altstadt, is the best area for tourists.The historic centre of the city, this is the best neighborhood.

name: Rhodes
detail: Rhodes Old Town is our top pick. This is the perfect wandering place in the city. There is so much history and beauty in the walls.

name: Brussels
detail: Brussels Ville. Brussels City lies among the boulevards that envelop “the ring” or the historic and commercial centre of the capital.

name: Marrakech
detail: Without a doubt, the best area to stay in Marrakech is the old and historical district of the city, the Medina. We recommended for this place.
